name: Balloonimals
description: See what is the highest score you can get in this cute endless runner style game. You must control a balloon tethered to a little animal which you then guide through dangerous objects whilst collecting fruits (and pizza!) to increase your score. You can also earn leaves through various methods as well as general gameplay with which you may use to buy adorable new animals and cool balloon skins. Earn cool medals as you level up and unlock the ability to buy awesome power-ups which can be used to aid you in your search for balloon-animal dominance!
